resources.string: If you want lock screen you need accept this

Version 1.0

 This app uses proximity sensor to block miss-clicked calls.

 If the proximity sensor is obstructed when making a call, it will be probably by mistake, your phone can be in your pocket and your call will be blocked.
 Optionally the application can also make the screen lock to lock a call.


Author: Igor Velho
 E-Mail: southdev4@gmail.com
This device does not have proximity sensor, this application can not be executed
